problem.markdown:
Numerator relations appear where on the WHO DQ tool dashboard?
>>Select the one correct answer: (2 attempts) <<
( ) A. The Completeness tab ( ) B. The Consistency - Time Tab (x) C. The Consistency - Data Tab ( ) D. The Outliers Tab [explanation] The Consistency - Data Tab is correct [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.p: Numerator relations appear where on the WHO DQ tool dashboard?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Select the one correct answer: (2 attempts)

div.p: The Consistency - Data Tab is correct
